ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
Buzzard, formally the sheriff of a small western town where the townsfolk were turned into nefarious zombies, returns to Horse Eater's Woods to better understand the source of a horrifying curse that plagues the people of Goon's town.
This issue also features a bonus story, written and illustrated by the Fillbach Brothers, which revisits the pie-eating Skunk Ape, who gets his kicks from terrorizing elementary school children.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-13 00:20:01. [CVDB130846]
